body_html: We didn't open source the standalone version, however it's pretty easy to use the existing standalone version with your own data. Just fork https://github.com/tensorflow/embedding-projector-standalone/ and edit the oss_demo_projector_config.json to point to your datasets.
body_text: We didn't open source the standalone version, however it's pretty easy to use the existing standalone version with your own data. Just fork https://github.com/tensorflow/embedding-projector-standalone/ and edit the oss_demo_projector_config.json to point to your datasets.
body: We didn't open source the standalone version, however it's pretty easy to use the existing standalone version with your own data. Just fork https://github.com/tensorflow/embedding-projector-standalone/ and edit the [oss_demo_projector_config.json](https://github.com/tensorflow/embedding-projector-standalone/blob/master/oss_data/oss_demo_projector_config.json) to point to your datasets.
